attributes.action: support Dot Read of Merseyside in her Planning Application submitted to Welwyn Borough Council, to demolish the house in Cuffley, Hertfordshire, owned by Tesco Chief Executive, Sir Terrence Leahy and to turn it into a community garden.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
